comment: But you need to get both. You have all my compassion, this has been HELL. But we have to keep trying and I do think it will help at least some of the symptoms! In fact my stomach hasnt hurt at all since I got it and its been driving my nuts for months. Please try!

comment: I was scared too, but I have worked so hard to get better and I knew many people that are getting better after the vaccines. So I knew I had to bite the bullet and try. My arm hurt badly for days and I had aches for hrs. Then I was fine! Be brave and get it! Youll be ok!

comment: Was just talking to Jo about it yesterday. Know that I am thinking of you and PLEASE let me know if you have any side effects. She had me in tears yesterday hearing what she is going thru. Much to you all!!
